3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation with clear height, thickness, and volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is high; rooms and walls align perfectly. Minor discrepancy in staircase railing/wall height.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement, kitchen appliances, and bathroom fixtures match 2D layout perfectly.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render with soft shadows and logical materials. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: The 'UP' stairs section adds a visual partition wall not explicitly detailed in the 2D plan, though logically consistent with 3D interpretation.

summary: High-fidelity 3D conversion that maintains almost perfect geometric and spatial alignment with the original 2D floor plan.
